Best CBD and hemp credit card processing in Los Angeles.

Sell CBD products online and in-store with our payment solutions. Our experience with high-risk payment processing means your account stays active. 

Accept Payments Now

We specialize in providing high-risk merchant accounts for CBD and hemp businesses, offering tailored solutions to address your unique needs and challenges.

  • High-risk Expertise
  • Fast Approvals
  • Low Fees
Apply Today

Leading credit card processing for CBD and hemp in Los Angeles.

eCommerce Integrations

Seamless eCommerce integrations with the top online shopping platforms. 

Low Rates Guaranteed

We guarantee that your industry-low rate will never go up. 

Speak to an Expert

High-risk expertise for CBD and hemp businesses.

We excel in serving high-risk CBD and hemp businesses, understanding their specific challenges. Our tailored solutions provide secure payment processing, compliance with industry regulations, and financial stability. We offer the support and flexibility needed to navigate the unique landscape of high-risk businesses, allowing you to focus on growth and success while we manage the complexities of payment processing. 

Customizable POS systems.

Our point of sale (POS) options are expertly designed for CBD and hemp businesses, offering a tailored solution that streamlines your operations. From efficient transaction processing to inventory management and compliance with industry regulations, our POS system empowers your business to provide exceptional service. With features customized to your unique needs, you can be assured that Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers the best CBD and hemp merchant processing in L.A. 

01 02

Step 1

Apply for an account and get approved in as little as 24 hours. 

Step 2

Integrate with your existing store or get started with our tools. 

Step 3

Enjoy low fees and 24/7 customer support with a real person. 

Leading payment processor for high-risk businesses in L.A.
